video.title: The Physics of Light
video.synopsis: This illuminating series uses light to explore Newton's law of gravity, Einstein's theory of relativity, string theory and other scientific concepts.

episodes.synopsis: Animations and real-world demonstrations show how Einstein unraveled mysteries of speed and light as he developed his theory of special relativity.
episodes.title: Light and Time: The Special Theory of Relativity

episodes.synopsis: Beginning with the question of what makes us fall, this episode explores the gravitational concepts behind Einstein's theory of general relativity.
episodes.title: Light and Space: The Theory of General Relativity

episodes.synopsis: Travel back in time as Galileo's telescope illuminates the night sky in new ways and Isaac Newton's experiments reveal the spectrum of color in light.
episodes.title: In Pursuit of Light

episodes.synopsis: Venture into the tiny world of the atom and trace the roots of quantum theory, from the discovery of the electron to Niels Bohr's revolutionary model.
episodes.title: Light and Atoms

episodes.synopsis: This segment focuses on Heisenberg and Schrödinger as they struggle to make sense of conflicting theories and develop a deeper understanding of atoms.
episodes.title: Light and Quantum Physics

episodes.synopsis: In this final chapter, discover the concepts behind string theory and the quest for a single, unifying framework to explain the universe.
episodes.title: Light and Strings
